ilex.fitting.scatt_pulse_profile

scatt_pulse_profile(x, p)[source]
Info:

Scattering time series profile with n pulses

Parameters:

  • x (ndarray) – x data array

  • p (dict) – dictionary of params for pulses, for each pulse n: [a[n]] -> Pulse amplitude [mu[n]] -> Pulse position [sig[n]] -> Pulse width [tau] -> scattering timescale

Returns:

y data array

Return type:

y (ndarray)
